description: From Middle French, from Latin indēfatīgābilis (“untiring”), from in- (“not”) + dēfatīgō (“to tire out”).

adjectives.description: indefatigable (comparative more indefatigable, superlative most indefatigable)

examples: Synonyms: inexhaustible, relentless, tireless, unflagging, unsinkable, untiring, unwearying
